fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**Saddle Up**: Give somebody a ride, making there ability indirect tonight.
**Access Storage**: Learn what roles are currently in storage and gain the option to use them.
**Lead Along**: Learn who a player visits and who visits them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: **Storage!**: Gain storage, putting in a random ability from <#970046125065265202> in there each night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Slay all else and turn them into gear
